# shared

**Type Property**

The singleton app instance for accessing age range services.

## Declaration

```swift
static let shared: AgeRangeService
```

## Discussion

Use `shared` to access the [doc://com.apple.declaredagerange/documentation/DeclaredAgeRange/AgeRangeService] instance in your app.
title: shared
